DOC.brief_summary: Phase III: Assess conventional RT w/ conventional Plus accelerated boost RT in the treatment of nasopharyngeal CA
DOC.brief_title: Phase III: Assess Conventional RT w/ Conventional Plus Accelerated Boost RT in the Treatment of Nasopharyngeal CA
DOC.detailed_description: It's a phase III study to assess conventional Rad Therapy with conventional Plus accelerated boost Rad Therapy in the treatment of nasopharyngeal carcinoma.
DOC.criteria: Patients with nasopharyngeal Carcinoma Patients with carcinoma other than histopathologically confirmed nasopharyngeal CA
